sentences.sContent: You are the one with a lump.
sentences.sContent_eng: You are the one with a lump.
sentences.sCn: 你是那个有了肿块的人。

sentences.sContent: One day, I noticed a lump in her skin.
sentences.sContent_eng: One day, I noticed a lump in her skin.
sentences.sCn: 有一天，我注意到她皮肤上有个肿块。

sentences.sContent: Then the lump or cancer attaches itself to this wall.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then the lump or cancer attaches itself to this wall.
sentences.sCn: 然后肿块或癌就附着在那钙壁上。

synos.tran: 块，块状；[医]肿块；瘤；很多；笨人
混在一起；使成块状；忍耐；笨重地移动

phrases.pCn: 整笔付款；一次总算，一次总付
混合价格；总括价格；整笔计价格

words.tran: 粗笨的；波浪起伏的；多块状物的
码头工人；装卸工；小承包商

trans.tranOther: to collect into a mass or group
a small piece of something solid, without a particular shape
to put two or more different people or things together and consider them as a single group, sometimes wrongly
